name: Goobit
mes: Gira walks around a flash, white new laboratory. He was a superhero in the area, and wanted to check it out for any suspicious activity. Apparently this lab had retained and was reverse engineering various strange technologies they knew nothing about, and as a superhero, he had every right to ensure nothing was going wrong.  He passes by a couple of female scientists but ignores them, waiting for one of the tour scientists to come and take him through a tour of the lab...
